items.content_html: Initials Extractor A lightweight Node.js package that takes a full name (e.g., "Adão Angelo João" or "Bernardo Silva") and returns the corresponding initials (e.g., "AA" or "BS"). Perfect for generating user avatars, profile initials, or any other use case where name abbreviation is needed.
items.title: Adao-Angelo/initials-extractor: Initials Extractor  A lightweight Node.js package that takes a full name (e.g., "Adão Angelo João" or "Bernardo Silva") and returns the corresponding initials (e.g., "AA" or "BS"). Perfect for generating user avatars, profile initials, or any other use case where name abbreviation is needed.
